name: Lily Pad Fishing
description:
Fish with Lily Pad Roots. 

You play as a fisherman which is uses lily pads instead of fishing poles. Activate a lily pad to extend its roots, the roots will then catch any fish and bring them back to the surface. Your goal is to catch at least one of each fish kind. You can also sell any caught fish and use the money to upgrade your lily pads or buy new lilypads.
